attributes.action: MP should be removed from service if they have Criminal Convictions
attributes.additional_details: When you apply for employment your records are checked for Criminal Convictions and public with Criminal Convictions are prevented from obtaining jobs because of these. Especially if involves violence but also dishonesty. Therefore why do we have MPs and others who are still being paid for work by our government in one way or another that have criminal convictions that would prevent anyone else from obtaining a job.
